search_results.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
search_results.snippet: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan is a 1982 American science fiction film directed by Nicholas Meyer and based on the television series Star Trek.

search_results.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan: The Making of the Classic Film
search_results.snippet: An in-depth look at the making of Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan, featuring rare and previously unseen production art and new and exclusive interviews.

search_results.title: Khan Noonien Singh
search_results.snippet: In Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan, set 15 years after "Space Seed", Khan escapes his exile and sets out to exact revenge on Kirk. In Star Trek Into Darkness, ...
